title: Trying (and failing) to interact with Japanese people
description:
On my quest to reconnect with the source of childhood nostalgia, I did what any gaijin foriegner does and wandered around Akihabara (anime district) of Tokyo where I encountered the many faces of Japan. 

Check out the full japan video doc here:
https://youtu.be/0pCw_WzzJT4


TRACKS USED:

Nostalgic Pokemon Music
https://youtu.be/3B4_G9eMr-o?si=A8LpBAdzfEruTdr7

Olivers Army - Elvis Costello cover by 45rpm Dan79
https://youtu.be/SPL2UmDz3og?si=6lDva-OkhYOcx8Be

Heavenly Jungle Mix Pt 1
https://youtu.be/knsIkEY4zoI?si=blJqPAA1bsmMgalD

IGGY POP FANCLUB - NUMBER GIRL (LIVE IN EZO 1999)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cqUwUOq9z5E
